entry.title: Quest for Interpolation
entry.summary:
Recently in some contract work I needed to find a function that fit a dataset that was given to me. Programatically I needed this function in order to generate the right output for the UI I was creating. Otherwise, I would be forced to arbitrarily map values to a result which is never ideal.

I found out that the thing I was looking for that I remembered doing all the time on my TI 83 - Silver Edition, is called interpolation and is a pretty intensely studied field.

I also found out how to accomplish this in Python and also generate the coeffiecients that are required to make a function.

entry.title: Gotta start somewhere
entry.summary: This is the content of my super new blog post.
